original_text: You must go to the place that he will choose as his special home. You must kill the animal there, at sunset. That was the time of day when you came out of Egypt.
korean_text: 오직 네 하나님 여호와께서 자기의 이름을 두시려고 택하신 곳에서 네가 애굽에서 나오던 시각 곧 초저녁 해 질 때에 유월절 제물을 드리고

sentences.original_text: You must go to the place
that he will choose as his special home
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신의 특별한 거처로 선택할 그 곳으로

sentences.original_text: You must kill the animal there
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그곳에서 그 동물을 죽여야 한다

sentences.original_text: That was the time of day
when you came out of Egypt
